Explanation: Mandatory option. This is followed by your group's name. Use `quota_info` to check the account/group name.
Mandatory option. Used to access the priority
Mandatory option. Specify whether you want CPU or GPU node.
Optional. The total number of CPUs. Default is 1 core unless specified.
Optional. The amount of walltime to reserve for your job in hours. Default is 1 hour unless specified.
Optional. The total number of GPUs. Default is 1 GPU unless specified.
Optional. Specify the name of the partition. (Default: `general` for CPU jobs, `gpu` for GPU jobs).
